title: Add integrate Stream Evaluator
description:
Now that we have splines and derivatives it makes sense to add integration.  The integrate Stream Evaluator will perform a Romberg Integration (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romberg%27s_method) given a spline and min and max values.

Implementation provided by Apache Commons Math.
